enum SAIClient::ClientID

Different constants related to CompanyID.

Enumerator:
INVALID_CLIENT_ID 

Client is not part of anything.

CLIENT_ID_SERVER 

Servers always have this ID.

CLIENT_ID_FIRST 

The first client ID.
